en-US.summary: Test your knowledge of the selected content.
en-US.name: Cool Quiz
en-US.description:
Test your knowledge of the selected content.

My Quiz provides a fun way to study a variety of content.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Cool Quiz" or "Alexa, open Cool Quiz" to start the game.

At anytime, you can stop the game by saying "Alexa, stop"

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Include your testing instruction (if any) here
